articles.title: Only 3% of international climate aid going to transitioning communities: ‘This is absurd’

articles.title: Scientists criticize ‘straw man’ arguments in Bill Gates climate memo
articles.description: Tech billionaire relying on ‘false binary’ with call to focus less on emissions and more on aid for poor, experts sayA new memo on the climate crisis from Bill Gates relies on “straw man” arguments about the threat to humanity and “false dichotomies” between spending on climate or aid for the poor, some climate scientists say.
